code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useDispatch,useSelector}from'react-redux';import Login from'./login';import Register from'./register';import{logoutUser}from'../actions/authActions';import{Nav,Button}from'react-bootstrap';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Authentication=()=>{const[activeTab,setActiveTab]=useState('login');const dispatch=useDispatch();const loggedIn=useSelector(state=>state.auth.loggedIn);const username=useSelector(state=>state.auth.username);const handleSelect=selectKey=>{setActiveTabe(selectKey);};const logout=()=>{dispatch(logoutUser());};const userNotLoggedIn=/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"auth-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Nav,{variant:"tabs",activeKey:activeTab,onSelect:handleSelect,className:"mb-3 dark-tabs justify-content-center",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav.Item,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav.Link,{eventKey:"login",children:"Login"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav.Item,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Nav.Link,{eventKey:"register",children:"Register"})})]}),activeTabe==='register'?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Register,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Login,{})]});const userLoggedIn=/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center",children:["logged in as: ",username,' ',/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"outline-light",onClick:logout,children:"Logout"})]});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:loggedIn?userLoggedIn:userNotLoggedIn});};export default Authentication;
